TargetName: SOW-0302: Provide openings on two opposite sides with doors and hardware

Notes: FACT. Datasheet explicitly states Scope Coverage = SOW-0302. Confirmed in decomposition scope ledger.

TargetName: OBJ-004: Deliver unheated cold storage building with practical access and door configuration compatible with main building
Statement: DEL-04-02 supports OBJ-004 (deliver the unheated cold storage building with practical access; moisture management; and door configuration compatible with the main building)
Notes: FACT. Datasheet explicitly states Objective Support = OBJ-004. Confirmed in decomposition objectives table.

Statement: DEL-04-02 requires DEL-04-01 draft concept to confirm building orientation; side identification; structural opening sizes; and framing coordination for rough openings
EvidenceQuote: DEL-04-01 at minimum a draft concept to confirm building orientation side identification and structural opening sizes
Notes: FACT. Procedure explicitly lists DEL-04-01 as a prerequisite for proposal phase production. Also referenced in Steps A1 and A10 and Guidance C1.

TargetName: Structure Envelope Roof & Overhead Doors (Main Building)

Notes: FACT. Procedure prerequisite explicitly requires PKG-002 overhead door spec. Guidance P2 and Specification REQ-4202-03 verification reinforce this cross-reference requirement.

Notes: FACT. Procedure prerequisite explicitly lists PKG-003 site layout. Guidance C1 reinforces site access routing dependency.

Statement: DEL-04-02 concrete apron drainage direction must be coordinated with site grading and drainage design (PKG-003/DEL-03-02) to ensure positive drainage and avoid ponding or ice hazards

Notes: FACT. Guidance C6 and Procedure Step B8 explicitly require coordination with PKG-003/DEL-03-02 for apron drainage.

Statement: DEL-04-02 concrete apron design intent must be consistent with floor/foundation approach in DEL-04-03; apron loading basis coordinates with floor system
Notes: FACT. Procedure Step A5 and Guidance C2 explicitly require apron design coordination with DEL-04-03.

Statement: DEL-04-02 overhead door opener electrical requirements (power supply; circuit protection; operator wiring) must be coordinated with DEL-04-04 electrical system design per REQ-4202-14
EvidenceQuote: overhead door opener electrical requirements shall be coordinated with the electrical system design for the cold storage building (DEL-04-04)
Notes: FACT. Specification REQ-4202-14 explicitly requires coordination with DEL-04-04. Procedure Steps A6 and B4 and Guidance C3 reinforce.

Statement: DEL-04-02 person doors must meet applicable Alberta Building Code requirements for egress size and hardware; ABC edition TBD; AHJ confirmation required
EvidenceQuote: Person doors shall be adequate to meet applicable building code requirements for egress size and hardware
Notes: FACT. Specification REQ-4202-09 explicitly requires ABC compliance. Also REQ-4202-15 (wind-load) and REQ-4202-16 (fire separation). ABC edition TBD.

Statement: DEL-04-02 person door keying scheme requires same key as pickled-sand storage building per REQ-4202-08; hardware supplier must coordinate key commonality across both buildings
EvidenceQuote: deadbolt key for cold storage person doors shall be the same as the key for the pickled-sand storage building
Notes: FACT. REQ-4202-08 explicitly requires key commonality with pickled-sand building. Pickled-sand is out of scope (SOW-0400) so this is an external interface.
